MetaData.ApsimToSim:
[foreach Soil.SoilWat]
[Model SoilWat] [soil.DiffusConst][soil.DiffusSlope][soil.CN2Bare][soil.CNRed][soil.CNCov][soil.Salb][soil.SummerCona][soil.WinterCona][soil.SummerU][soil.WinterU][soil.SummerDate][soil.WinterDate][soil.Thickness(mm)][soil.Sat(mm/mm)][soil.Dul(mm/mm)][soil.LL15(mm/mm)][soil.AirDry(mm/mm)][soil.SWCon(0-1)][soil.BD(g/cc)][soil.SW(mm/mm)] [if [soil.MWCon(0-1)]] [soil.MWCon(0-1)] [endif] [if [soil.KS(mm/day)]] [soil.KS(mm/day)] [endif] [if [soil.Slope]] [soil.Slope] [endif] [if [soil.DischargeWidth]] [soil.DischargeWidth] [endif] [if [soil.CatchmentArea]] [soil.CatchmentArea] [endif] [if [soil.KLAT]] [soil.KLAT] [endif] [if [soil.MaxPond]] [soil.MaxPond] [endif]
[endfor] [foreach Soil.Swim]
[Model Swim3] [soil.CN2Bare][soil.CNRed][soil.CNCov][soil.Salb][soil.Thickness (mm)][soil.AirDry][soil.Sat][soil.Dul][soil.LL15][soil.BD][soil.SW(mm/mm)][soil.KS][soil.Kdul][soil.PsiDUL][soil.VC]apsimcalc[soil.dtmin][soil.dtmax][soil.MaxWaterIncrement][soil.SpaceWeightingFactor][soil.SoluteSpaceWeightingFactor][soil.diagnostics] [foreach Swim.SwimSubsurfaceDrain] [SwimSubsurfaceDrain.DrainDepth][SwimSubsurfaceDrain.DrainSpacing][SwimSubsurfaceDrain.DrainRadius][SwimSubsurfaceDrain.Klat][SwimSubsurfaceDrain.ImpermDepth] [endfor] [foreach Swim.SwimWaterTable] [SwimWaterTable.WaterTableDepth] [endfor] [Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.a][Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.dthc][Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.dthp] [Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.dis][Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.disp][soil.NO3Exco][soil.NO3FIP][soil.NH4Exco][soil.NH4FIP][soil.UreaExco][soil.UreaFIP][soil.ClExco][soil.ClFIP][Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableNO3][Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableNH4][Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableUrea][Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableCl] [endfor]
0.693 25.0 0.4 0.4 0.4 0.4 0.5 0.6 0.9 0.9 default manure mucuna lablab shemp stable 0.2 0.3 0.54 0.57 0.45 0.0 0.7 0.3 0.37 0.37 0.47 0.1 0.1 0.4 0.09 0.06 0.08 0.9 1.7 8.0
32.0 32.0 0.0081 0.004 0.2 0.1 0.05 0.25 0.0095 0.003 0.00015 0.00007 0.0 0.0 100.
0.0 0.5 1.0 2.0 0.0 1.0 1.0 0.5 0.0 .25 1.0 2.0 0.0 1.0 1.0 0.0
40.0 90 4.5 6.0 8.0 9.0 0.0 1.0 1.0 0.0 0.0006 1 25.1 21.33333 100.0 0.0 1.18 0.0
[soil.SoilType] [soil.RootCN] [soil.RootWT] [soil.SoilCN] [soil.EnrACoeff] [soil.EnrBCoeff] off [soil.OC(Total %)] [soil.PH(1:5 water)] [soil.FBIOM(0-1)] [soil.FINERT(0-1)] [soil.NO3(ppm)] [soil.NH4(ppm)]
0.0324 0.015 0.0 0.5 1.0 2.0 0.05 1.0 1.0 0.5
500.0 0.24 0.24 0.407 0.24 0.5 0.46 0.46 0.46 default stable 0.59 0.2 0.41 0.8 0.0 0.0 1.7 8.0 32.0 32.0 0.0010848 0.0005424 0.0274 0.0137 0.0001 0.00005 0.0 0.0 0.0000323 0.00001615 0.0 0.0 100. 0.0 0.5 1.0 2.0 0.0 1.0 1.0 0.5 0.0 .25 1.0 2.0 0.0 1.0 1.0 0.0 40.0 90 4.5 6.0 8.0 9.0 0.0 1.0 1.0 0.0
500.0 0.24 0.24 0.407 0.24 0.5 0.46 0.46 0.46 default stable 0.59 0.2 0.41 0.8 0.0 0.0 1.7 8.0 32.0 32.0 0.0010848 0.0005424 0.0274 0.0137 0.0001 0.00005 0.0 0.0 0.0000323 0.00001615 0.0 0.0 100. 0.0 0.5 1.0 2.0 0.0 1.0 1.0 0.5 0.0 .25 1.0 2.0 0.0 1.0 1.0 0.0 40.0 90 4.5 6.0 8.0 9.0 0.0 1.0 1.0 0.0
0.2 0.3 0.54 0.57 0.45 0.05 0.7 0.3 0.37 0.37 0.47 0.05 0.0081 0.004 0.05 0.025 0.0005 0.00025 on
[foreach Soil.Phosphorus]
[Model SoilP] [soil.RootCP][soil.RateDissolRock][soil.RateLossAvail][soil.LabileP(mg/kg)][soil.BandedP(kg/ha)][soil.RockP(kg/ha)][soil.Sorption(-)][soil.SorptionCoeff] [endfor] [if [soil.Cl (mg/kg)]]
[Model Cl] 1000 0 cl 0 [soil.Cl (mg/kg)]
[endif]

Model.name: SoilWat

canopy_eos_coef.description: coef. in exp effect of canopy on

sw_top_crit.description: critical sw ratio in top layer

solute_flow_eff.description: efficiency of moving solute with flow (0-1)

solute_flux_eff.description: efficiency of moving solute with flux (0-1)

gravity_gradient.description: soil water gradient due to gravitational

Model.mobile_solutes: no3 urea cl br org_n org_c_pool1 org_c_pool2 org_c_pool3

canopy_fact_default.description: canopy factor to use if height is missing

chisel.description: will have no effect - SOILWAT the same as old ver.

Model.name: SoilP

rate_decr_placement.description: 0.5 () ! (, 1) Fractional loss of placement effect per yr

act_energy_loss_avail_P.description: Effect of soil temperature on P availability

availP_ratio.description: Ratio of available P : unavailable P at steady state

eff_band.description: 3.0 () ! Relative effectiveness of banded_p compared with broadcast_p

Model.crop_name: maize wheat navybean cowpea pigeonpea soybean peanut mungbean weed sorghum butterflypea centro lablab millet millet1 millet2 millet3 millet4 millet5

variable.name: cn2_bare
variable.description: curve number input used to calculate runoff

variable.name: cn2_new
variable.description: CN2 after modification for crop cover

variable.name: cn_cov
variable.description: cover term in curve number equation

variable.name: cn_red
variable.description: CN reduction in curve number equation (cover)

variable.name: cover_surface_runoff
variable.description: Effective cover used in runoff calculation

variable.name: eos
variable.description: Potential evap after modification for green cover and residue

variable.name: esw
variable.description: Extractible soil water relative to LL15

variable.name: flow
variable.description: depth of water moving from layer l+1 into layer l because of unsaturated flow. positive value indicates upward movement into layer l, negative value indicates downward movement (mm) out of layer l

variable.name: flux
variable.description: initially, water moving downward into layer l, then water moving downward out of layer l

variable.name: outflow_lat
variable.description: lateral flow out of the profile

variable.name: profile_esw_depth
variable.description: initial depth of extractable soil water distributed from the top down

variable.name: profile_fesw
variable.description: initial fraction of esw of profile distributed from top down

variable.name: wet_soil_depth
variable.description: initial depth of soil filled to drained upper limit (field capacity)

variable.name: dlt_fom_c_pool1
variable.description: delta fom C pool in fraction 1

variable.name: dlt_fom_c_pool2
variable.description: delta fom C pool in fraction 2

variable.name: dlt_fom_c_pool3
variable.description: delta fom C pool in fraction 3

variable.name: dlt_fom_n_min
variable.description: Net FOM N mineralized, negative for immobilization

variable.name: dlt_res_c_atm
variable.description: Carbon from residues lost to atmosphere

variable.name: dlt_res_c_biom
variable.description: Carbon from residues lost to atmosphere

variable.name: dlt_res_c_hum
variable.description: Carbon from residues converted to humic

variable.name: excess_nh4
variable.description: Excess N required above NH4 supply

variable.name: soilp_dlt_org_p
variable.description: variable needed by soilp in its calculations

variable.name: soilp_dlt_res_c_atm
variable.description: Carbon from all residues to atmosphere

variable.name: soilp_dlt_res_c_biom
variable.description: Carbon from all residues to biomass

variable.name: soilp_dlt_res_c_hum
variable.description: Carbon from all residues to humic
